title: Concentrated Liquidity Pools (CLP) for Cardano
summary: Cardano DEX liquidity is fragmented and capital-inefficient, traders face high slippage and LPs earn poor returns due to lack of a reusable concentrated liquidity primitive.
solution: Build an reusable concentrated liquidity pool on Cardano, integrated with a DEX aggregator and oracle manager, to give traders better prices and LPs higher capital efficiency.
proposer_relevant_experience:
Project Team and Roles:

1. Tran Anh Quan (Smart Contract Engineer): 5+ years of experience in Plutus, Aiken, and system integration, specializing in Cardano smart contract development (Danogo Fixed-rate Lending, Yield Aggregator)
    1. https://github.com/Mavis2103
    2. https://www.linkedin.com/in/qu%C3%A2n-tr%E1%BA%A7n-97280821a
2. Truong Quang Khang (Backend Engineer): 5++ years of experience in backend systems, micro-service application and and integration, specializing in Cardano (Danogo Fixed rate lending, Yield Aggregator)
    1. [https://github\.com/Truongquangkhang](https://github.com/Truongquangkhang)

sub_fields.title: Category Questions
sub_fields.description: Answer the following questions to determine the eligibility of your proposal.

sub_fields.title: Describe what makes your idea innovative compared to what has been previously launched in the market (whether by you or others).
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
On Cardano, most DEXs use the standard AMM model, there is currently no DEX using a Concentrated Liquidity Pool (CLP) model

CLP focuses on capital efficiency for liquidity providers: It allows providers to choose a clear price range for their liquidity instead of spreading capital across the entire curve like existing AMM pools. With the same amount of capital, liquidity becomes thicker around the most actively traded price range.

CLP is designed as an open pool type: It can be integrated by other projects and aggregators, not locked inside a single DEX implementation.

sub_fields.title: Describe what your prototype or MVP will demonstrate, and where it can be accessed.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
The Prototype / MVP will include:



A web interface on testnet where users can select token pairs, set price ranges, and manage the list of pools they have created.



Public smart contracts on testnet for CLP.



The community will be able to access:



A testnet dApp link, using a testnet wallet to interact with CLP.



A GitHub repository containing the CLP smart contracts deployed on testnet.

sub_fields.title: Describe realistic measures of success, ideally with on-chain metrics.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
Successfully deployed and running on testnet.



- At least 10 pools are created.
- At least 1,000 transactions are executed on testnet.
- At least 100 user join incentized testnet program



Successfully launching on Mainnet.

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
Most DEXs on Cardano currently use full-range AMM models. Liquidity from providers is spread across the entire price range, so when there are large trades, traders easily experience high slippage, and liquidity providers earn relatively low fees compared to the capital they lock.



Approach

- Build a Concentrated Liquidity Pool (CLP) on Cardano, where providers can choose a price range for their capital instead of supplying full-range, so liquidity is more concentrated.
- Design CLP as a standard pool type, allowing third parties to integrate it easily.



Major Features:

- Providers can choose a price range around the most actively traded prices to increase capital efficiency.
- Support multiple fee tiers for the same pair, matching different financial strategies and risk profiles of proiders.
- Providers can easily manage their capital by withdrawing liquidity and opening new positions in other pools or price ranges.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
Deliverables to Impact outputs:

- Providers: They can allocate capital into price ranges where trading actually happens, earning more fees per unit of capital and managing their exposure more actively.
- Traders: Deeper liquidity around the market price reduces slippage on key pairs, improving trading experience and making Cardano more competitive as a DeFi base layer.

sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
Team Capability:

Our team has hands-on experience building and deploying Cardano DeFi protocols, including 

- Danogo Fixed-rate Lending – A lending protocol with fixed terms and predictable rates.
- Nio-App – A DeFi application integrating multiple financial services on Cardano.



We have expertise in smart contracts, off-chain infrastructure, and API services.

sub_fields.title: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.description: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.answer:
Estimated Project Duration: 12 months – Total Budget: ₳182,000 (ADA/USD ≈ 0.4, updated 26 Nov 2025)

1/ Product Research (₳20,000)

- Research & specification phase to make sure the CLP design is realistic and clear before development
- Define data flow between smart contracts, off-chain services, frontend.
- Design system architecture: pool structure, LP positions, fee, price range
- high-level UX flows (create pool, Supply/Withdraw liquidity) to guide UI/UX and development.

2/ Project Management (₳17,000)

- Coordinate tasks, track milestones, maintain Catalyst reports, manage resources.

3/ Project Development (₳112,000)

- Build backend services and off-chain layer (transaction builder, indexer, APIs).
- Develop and maintain smart contracts
- Frontend UI implementation and integration according to milestones.
- Infrastructure costs

4/ Project Testing & Audit  (₳33,000)

- Functional tests, deploy on testnet and mainnet, and prepare final reports and documentation.

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
Output is not a single app, but a reusable protocol primitive (open-source smart contracts )



Project includes public testnet and external audit, reducing future duplicate spending on “fix and rebuild” phases.



Taken together, scope, team size, regional cost base, and open-source nature of deliverables mean the requested ₳182,000 represents a reasonable and efficient investment for wider Cardano ecosystem.
